content: this is my favorite sock pattern for adding a little texture & design while keeping things simple it s also fabulous for changing up some crazy pooling sock yarn top down sock knit on either us 1 s 2 25mm or us 1 5 s 2 5 using treasured toes sock yarn or a skein of your favorite heel flat & traditional toe thank you to marianneho for creating the danish version of this pattern too happy creating christine
